Islamabad, the 3rd April, 2017 
No. F. 23(23)/2017-Legis.—The following Act of Majlis-e-Shoora 
(Parliament) received the assent of the President on the 30th March, 2017 is 
hereby published for general information:— 
Acr No. XIII OF 2017. 
An Act further to amend the Federal Board of Intermediate and Secondary 
Education Act, 1 975 
WHEREAS ills expedient further to amend the Federal Board of Intermediate 
and Secondary Education Act, 1975 	XVIII of 1975), for the purposes hereinafter 
appearing; 
It is hereby enacted as follows:— 
(119) 
[445(2017)/Ex. Gaz.] 	Price: Rs. 3.00 
120 	 THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., APRIL 5,2017 	[PART I 
1. 	Short title and commencement—(I) This Act may be called the 
Federal Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education (Amendment) Act, 2017. 
(2) 	It shall come into force at once. 
2. 	Amendment of section 2, Act LXVIII of 1975.—In the Federal 
Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education Act, 1975 (LXVIII of 1975), 
hereinafter referred to as the said Act, in section 2,— 
in clause (c), for the word "recognized", the word "affiliated" shall 
be substituted; 
in clause (h), for the word "recognized", the word "affiliated" shall 
be substituted; 
in clause (1), for the word "recognized", occurring twice, the word 
"affiliated" shall be substituted; and 
in clause (m), for the word "recognized", the word "affiliated" shall 
be substituted. 
3. 	Amendment of section 4, Act LXVIII of 1975.—In the said Act, 
in section 4,— 
after the word "countries", the words "and all other 
educational institutions desirous to seek affiliation with the Board 
from within the country and from abroad" shall be inserted; 
for the word "and", occurrn for the second time, the 
word "including" shall be subs( 	I: and 
for the word "recognition", . 	word 'affiliation" shall be 
substituted. 
4. 	Amendment of section 5, 	,XVIII of 1975.—In the said 
Act, in section 5,— 
in clause (c), for the words "Ministry of Education", the 
words "Division administering the Board" shall be substituted; and 
in clause (1), for the words and commas "Areas of Gilgit, 
Baltistan, Nagar, Haveli and Hunza -, the words "Government of 
Gilgit-Baltistan" shall be substituted. 
5. 	Amendment of section 8, A( \ VIII of 1975.—(1) In the said 
Act, in section 8, in sub-section (2),— 
(a) 	in clause (d),— 
(i) for the word "recognize", the word "affiliate" shall 
be substituted; and

(ii) in the proviso, for the word "recognition", the 
word "affiliation" shall be substituted; 
in clause (1), for the word "recognition", occurring twice, the word 
"affiliation" shall be substituted; 
in clause (h), for the words "recognized" and "recognition", the 
words "affiliated" and "affiliation" shall be respectively substituted; 
in clause (i), for the word "recognized", the word "affiliated" shall 
be substituted; and 
in clause (n), for the word "recognized", the word "affiliated" shall 
be substituted. 
6. 	Amendment of section 17, Act LXVIII of 1975.—In the said 
Act, in section 17, in sub-section (2), in clause (d), for the word "recognition", 
occurring twice, the word "affiliation" shall be substituted. 
ABDUL JABBAR ALI, 
Secretary.
